question: Which is the apex advisory body of the Ministry of Education?
explanation: Central Advisory Board of Education(CABE) is the apex advisory body of Ministry of education. It is one of the oldest advisory bodies in India. The Board comprises eminent educationalists as its members and representatives from central and state governments. The board meets once in a year to discuss about the progress in the educational sector and recommends future activities for the betterment of the sector. The board is headed is by the union education minister.
